pages.text: With Mica and End Diamonds, you can now make NuclearCraft machines. Now you can make better use of your Uranium and Thorium to make NuclearCraft reactors.$(br2)First, you should automate the production of radiation scrubbers and radaway. Once you have some protection from radiation, I suggest working towards Californium for maximum energy output.

Set aside some of any Plutonium isotope for wyvern cores later. For a lot of materials and energy, you can also start a fusion reactor at this point!$(br2)There is also a nicer way to make steel using NuclearCraft.$(br2)Now that you can craft NuclearCraft's Machine chassis, you are able to start with Applied Energistics 2 as the Inscriber needs it. You should really up your Calculator Circuit production as every

Processor in AE2 needs those. If you didn't make pure Crystals in advance you can spend some power to make them in the Empowerer until you have Crystal Growth Accelerators.$(br2)You can now make the Quantum Quarry from ExtraUtils2 which has the advantage of never having to move and using Silk Touch or Fortune to it.
